## OrderAddress interface

OrderAddress contains detailed information about an order's billing and shipping addresses

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OrderAddress 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [city](./magento-api.orderaddress.city.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The city or town |
|  [company?](./magento-api.orderaddress.company.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The customer's company |
|  [country\_code?](./magento-api.orderaddress.country_code.md) | Maybe&lt;[CountryCodeEnum](./magento-api.countrycodeenum.md)<!-- -->&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The customer's country |
|  [fax?](./magento-api.orderaddress.fax.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The fax number |
|  [firstname](./magento-api.orderaddress.firstname.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The first name of the person associated with the shipping/billing address |
|  [lastname](./magento-api.orderaddress.lastname.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The family name of the person associated with the shipping/billing address |
|  [middlename?](./magento-api.orderaddress.middlename.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The middle name of the person associated with the shipping/billing address |
|  [postcode?](./magento-api.orderaddress.postcode.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The customer's order ZIP or postal code |
|  [prefix?](./magento-api.orderaddress.prefix.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> An honorific, such as Dr., Mr., or Mrs. |
|  [region\_id?](./magento-api.orderaddress.region_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['ID'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The unique ID for a <code>Region</code> object of a pre-defined region |
|  [region?](./magento-api.orderaddress.region.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The state or province name |
|  [street](./magento-api.orderaddress.street.md) | Array&lt;Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt;&gt; | An array of strings that define the street number and name |
|  [suffix?](./magento-api.orderaddress.suffix.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> A value such as Sr., Jr., or III |
|  [telephone](./magento-api.orderaddress.telephone.md) | Scalars\['String'\] | The telephone number |
|  [vat\_id?](./magento-api.orderaddress.vat_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The customer's Value-added tax (VAT) number (for corporate customers) |
